name: Marcus Steelhand
long_description: The shop keeper is a small, but powerfully built man. He has light brown hair and a thich moustache. He has the manerisms of one who would be calm and relaxed in just about any situation.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to my weapon shop! Looking for a fine blade?
dialogue.default: Every weapon here is crafted with care and designed to serve you well in battle.
